bullet.title: jimmyvo2410.ResumeGen
bullet.description: Whenever I updated my resume, I also needed to update my online portfolio and Linkdin. It is annoying to me. So, I decided to automate that process. The project is about my solutions to generate Canadian resume from XML database, which is used in my online portfolio.

bullet.title: Galaxy
bullet.description: This is my first android VR game after I have learned some Unity skill sets from Dylan Fries's Unity workshops. I made it just similar to the old school game - Galaxy On Fire. In my game, Scenes, AI bots, asteroids are automatically generated. The game is also launched on Google Play Store, please click to find the link.

bullet.title: IpAddressAnalyzer
bullet.description: I found my self having many troubles with working on Ipv4 address in Networking classes. So I made this WinForm project to to help myself and other students to deal IPv4 addresses.

bullet.title: MoneyManage
bullet.description: I made the app after I finished the BIT's first term at Red River College, using the knowledge from Financial Accounting and Java programming class. I use the app to manage my daily transaction.

bullet.title: jimmyvo2410.github.io
bullet.description: The project is about my solutions to generate automatically online portfolio, carrer blogs, resume from xml database.

bullet.title: ObjectOrientationEstimationSystem
bullet.description: Matlab Modeling and simulating KF (Kalman Filter), EKF (Extended Kalman Filter) and other optimization approaches on Object Orientation Estimation System.

bullet.title: SenseIMU
bullet.description: Control a mouse by human gesture via Bluetooth - A demonstration of Extended Kalman Filter and other different optimization and estimation approaches.

bullet.title: VNDPlay
bullet.description: A pet project that includes some fun games (snake, sudoku) with other Bluetooth applications controlled by touch-screen LCD, joysticks, buttons and tilting the device. Everything is coded manually even a single pixel

bullet.title: RaspiBot
bullet.description: A remote controlled 4-wheel robot can perform face recognition and camera stabilization. It can be controlled by either an android application via Bluetooth or website via web server.

bullet.title: UltrasonicRobot
bullet.description: A remote-controlled 4-wheel robot detect obstacles with 2 ultrasonic sensors. This is my first project in electrical and automation.
